name: 36830 - Minnie Mouse: The Main Attraction - Series 9: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad - Train ONLY
description:
Description from Shop Disney:
Minnie Mouse boards the wildest ride in the wilderness for our monthly, limited release series of collectible cloisonné pins. Each set of three pins is themed to a different, classic attraction at the Disney Parks. This set, inspired by Frontierland's Big Thunder Mountain Railroad, is ready to roll into your collection. 
Magic in the details
Created especially for Walt Disney World Resort and Disneyland Resort 
Limited Release
Set of three pins, themed to Big Thunder Mountain Railroad, includes Minnie (in themed costume), Big Thunder Mountain, and themed Ear Hat
Enameled cloisonné
Golden finish
Mickey icon pinbacks
''Disney Pin Trading 2020'' symbol on back
Comes on commemorative card
Ninth of 12 sets in this monthly series
Big Thunder Mountain Railroad opened in Disneyland's Frontierland on September 2, 1979 and in Walt Disney World's Magic Kingdom on September 23, 1980
Part of the Minnie Mouse: The Main Attraction Collection 
The bare necessities
Metal / enamel
Up to 1 3/4'' H
Imported
Item No. 465050457462
